properties.areaDesc: Eastern McDowell; McDowell Mountains; Alexander; Greater Burke; Caldwell Mountains; Catawba; Greater Caldwell; Burke Mountains
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 1 at 2:56AM EST until February 1 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog.

* WHERE...The northern foothills of North Carolina, including
Alexander, Catawba, Caldwell, Burke, and McDowell counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...some pockets of freezing fog are possible
where temperatures fall to 32 degrees or below early this
morning. Patches of black ice are also possible in those areas.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you. Watch out for rapidly changing road
conditions.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING
